DOC.brief_summary: This research examine effectiveness 6-week online sleep program ( Go ! To Sleep ) provide set various psycho-educational material behavioral technique reduce insomnia symptom , improve sleep , improve quality life .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 70 year old . Currently live continental United States Canada . Symptoms insomnia base Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders ( DSMIV ) definition insomnia disorder : Selfreported sleep difficulty ( include sleeponset latency , wake sleep onset , early wake 30 min duration ) 3 time week past 3 month . Selfreported insomnia problem 3 month . Selfreported significant daytime impairment due sleep difficulty . Willingness log onto internet regular basis duration study ( 37 month ) . Willingness able complete almost daily sleep log track sleep pattern 2 month time ( approximately 23 min daily ) . Willingness Waitlist control group access program 3 month . Pregnant plan pregnant next 6 month . Lack internet access and/or Mac computer place residence . Currently participate participate group individual therapy insomnia prior month . Patient Health Questionnaire ( PHQ9 ) depression score > 14 . Recent treatment ( le 3 month ) medication depression anxiety . Change treatment medication depression anxiety past month plan change next 3 month . Current treatment ( therapy , prescription ) psychological emotional condition ( include limit : mania , manicdepression , psychosis , schizophrenia , adjustment disorder ) . Diagnosed currently suffer sleep disorder ( include , limited sleep apnea , restless leg syndrome , sleep walking , narcolepsy ) untreated treated less month . Suffer physical symptom medical condition may affect sleep ( include limit : pain , arthritis , tinnitus , diabetes , night time cough , shortness breath , hot flash , frequent urination , heartburn ) . Steroid stimulant use ( include limit prednisone , methylprednisolone Solumedrol ( inflammatory disorder ) , methylphenidate , Ritalin ( AttentionDeficit Hyperactivity disorder ) , Provigil ( narcolepsy ) , Wellbutrin Zyban ( tobacco cessation ) , cocaine methylenedioxymethamphetamine ( MDMA ) ( a.k.a . Ecstasy ) ) . Irregular workshift . Having young child may affect sleep pattern . Taking overthecounter prescribe sleep medication 3 time week . Alcoholism . Inability access internet consistent regular basis duration study ( 37 month ) . Inability complete daily sleep log track sleep pattern 2 month time . Unwillingness assigned waitlist control group 3 month prior gain access program .
